content:
/>
VI.i.2.A.1.c
.
Handling a Beneficiary’s Withdrawal of a Request for a Financial Audit
Treat a beneficiary’s withdrawal of a request for a financial audit like a request to withdraw a claim.
Follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 2.F.3.c
, for notifying the beneficiary.
Clear the EP 290, selecting
Claim Withdrawn
as the reason for the action.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Requests for Financial Audits
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
